description: Scopri i migliori hotel a Barcelona, Spain. Trova offerte esclusive e alloggi di lusso.

hotels.title: Modern Barcelona Urban Escape with Daily Breakfast, Welcome Cocktail & Outdoor Pool
hotels.description: Tucked away in trendy Eixample, H10 Itaca puts you right in the thick of Barcelona's most coveted neighbourhood, just a hop, skip and a jump from Plaça d'Espanya's buzzing energy. A makeover in 2018 gave this gem a serious glow up, combining Mediterranean soul with contemporary touches that'll have you feeling like you've struck gold in the heart of Catalonia. Start your day right with breakfast at De Blanc Restaurant, featuring floor-to-ceiling windows that frame street-side theatre while you feast on a knockout breakfast spread. When the sun's blazing, escape to El Jardí's sprawling 700-square-metre terrace oasis, complete with a plunge pool and sun loungers perfect for enjoying that Barcelona warmth. Cap off your adventures at the lobby bar with craft cocktails and tapas-style nibbles.

hotels.title: Prestigious Barcelona Escape with Daily Breakfast, Michelin-Starred Restaurant & Rooftop Infinity Pool
hotels.description: Coined 'the hotel with a thousand eyes', this five-star hotel's neoclassical design has been hijacked by sculptor Frederic Amat, who pinned hundreds of ceramic eyes on its front. The extravagant tone set by the exterior continues throughout your stay, with facilities that ensure your experience is equal parts comfortable and exciting. Indulge in a swim at the clear-sided rooftop swimming pool, savour a meal at Michelin-starred French restaurant from Romain Fornell or relax at the rooftop terrace with its celebrated bar shaking up excellent concoctions and aperitifs. Found in the heart of the Gothic Quarter, this five-star hotel is surrounded by a vibrant array of restaurants, shops, bars and cafes.

hotels.title: Five-Star Barcelona Escape with Serene Spa & Rooftop Terrace
hotels.description: InterContinental Barcelona, an IHG Hotel combines contemporary design and five-star comfort for guests seeking a slice of seaside Catalonia. Lose yourself in the historic city, discovering works of great artists like Picasso or sightseeing and shopping at Passeig de Gracia. Savour fine dining at Quirat or Arrel restaurants, find a moment of relaxation at the spa or soak up stunning views of the Barcelona skyline and Montjuïc Castle from the rooftop terrace.

hotels.title: Modern Barcelona Stay Near Marina & Gothic Quarter
hotels.description: Immerse yourself in luxury in one of Europe's most storied cities with a stay at Serras Hotel Barcelona. Once home to Pablo Picasso's first studio, the building opens to stunning seafront views and enjoys an ideal position among the city's most noteworthy sites. Breathe in the glorious Mediterranean breeze while relaxing on the rooftop, or treat yourself to the creations of Michelin-starred chef, Marc Gascons, at the hotel’s own Informal Restaurant.

hotels.title: Five-Star Barcelona Luxury with City-View Rooftop Bar & Pool
hotels.description: Awe-inspiring architecture, culture, art, history and world-revered cuisine - it’s all on offer at five-star The One Barcelona, located in the heart of the city. This luxurious haven - complete with a stylish rooftop bar - is the perfect base for exploring this Spanish seaside destination. From the modernist masterpieces of Antoni Gaudí, like La Sagrada Familia and Casa Batlló, to the Picasso museum, Barcelona is a treasure trove of art and architecture. Lose yourself in the medieval streets of the Gothic Quarter, where trendy bars spill out onto the pavements, walk the famous tree-lined La Rambla with its many shops and eateries, and soak up the Spanish sunshine with a sangria in hand at a beachfront bar. This stunning hotel is rated among the top 10% of properties worldwide on Tripadvisor, and it’s not hard to see why. Located near the upscale shopping street of Passeig de Gràcia (known as the Spanish Champs-Élysées), this five-star hotel is the perfect launchpad for city adventures. Onsite, you'll find a restaurant, 24-hour fitness centre, and luxurious spa. To end each day, guests can soak up panoramic city views from Mood rooftop bar with a cocktail in hand or plunge into the rooftop pool, where the views stretch across the city to the sea.

hotels.title: Stylish Barcelona Marina Stay with Rooftop Pool & Bar Overlooking Olympic Village
hotels.description: Seek sophistication and luxury with a rejuvenating stay at H10 Marina Barcelona. Set in the heart of the buzzing Olympic Village, boasting waterfront dining and a striking seafront promenade, the hotel is perfectly perched to admire views of the city from the hotel’s chic Skyline Terrace, a vibrant rooftop bar and pool area. After days spent exploring Barcelona, relax with a treatment at Despacio Spa Centre, along with curated dishes and tasty drinks at Dionissos Restaurant.

hotels.title: Barcelona City Break near Montjuic with Tapas Restaurant & Bar
hotels.description: Experience Spain's metropolitan culture at Barcelona Gran Via Plaza Espana, an IHG Hotel, placed conveniently next to the Fira exhibition centre. Enjoy tapas at onsite restaurant Àcota, peruse the wine and cocktail list for pre-dinner tipples, then hit the town. With the Espanya metro station mere steps from the hotel, the historic centre of Barcelona and famous La Rambla - with historic architecture, markets and entertainment - are easily within reach.

hotels.title: Barcelona City Break Overlooking Plaça de Catalunya with Rooftop Terrace & Swimming Pool
hotels.description: Stay in the beating heart of Barcelona at H10 Metropolitan, where you'll be overlooking the city’s most central point Plaça de Catalunya. The hotel has recently undergone a complete renovation led by the prestigious interior designer Lazaro Rosa-Violan. Make the most of fabulous facilities including a rooftop terrace with sun loungers and a swimming pool overlooking Plaça Catalunya and Tibidabo, plus Edén Bar and Terrace for cocktails and light bites and hearty breakfasts at the stylish Kitchen Restaurant. When exploring Barcelona, enjoy having the best of the city at your fingertips. Famous sites including Las Rambla and the Old Town's Gothic Quarter are all located within a five-minute walk. The Plaça de Catalunya station is a one-minute walk from the hotel, making getting to and from your next adventure easy. Passeig de Gràcia is located just a two-minute walk away and here's where you'll find the city's glitziest boutiques and restaurants, as well as Antoni Gaudí’s famous Casa Batlló and Casa Milà buildings. When you're ready for some fun in the sun, Barcelona's beaches are within walking distance.

hotels.title: Five-Star Heritage Barcelona Escape with Rooftop Terrace & Mayan-Themed Spa
hotels.description: Walk in the footsteps of Gaudi, indulge in fine wines and tapas, and slip into unparalleled relaxation in a Mayan-themed spa within Hotel Claris 5*GL Monument & Spa. This boutique Spanish haven is a member of the renowned Small Luxury Hotels of the World collection and ranked within the top 10% of properties on Tripadvisor. Set behind an original neoclassic facade from the 19th century and located within moments of Diagonal Avenue, Passeig de Gràcia, Plaça de Catalunya, Las Ramblas, and the historic Gothic Quarter, this elegantly refurbished hotel makes for a dream launchpad into Barcelona's culture and history. While outside is a feast for the senses, Hotel Claris 5*GL Monument & Spa more than holds its own. While the morning away with a spot of shopping in the Passeig de Gràcia boutiques before an afternoon spent perusing the hotel's museum. Unwind in one of the region's best spas, as listed in the Telegraph 2021, sip handcrafted cocktails on the breathtaking rooftop terrace and continue your culinary education in the two gourmet restaurants, La Terraza del Claris and Os-Kuro.

hotels.title: Boutique Barcelona Stay Near Gothic Quarter with Restaurant & Rooftop Bar
hotels.description: Become immersed in the heart of Barcelona at the chic H10 Montcada, a boutique hotel exuding timeless elegance. Perfectly situated in the Gothic Quarter, this hotel is a stone's throw from the iconic Las Ramblas, the Picasso Museum, and the awe-inspiring Barcelona Cathedral. Indulge in the city's finest tapas around the city before retreating to the hotel's rooftop terrace to sip cocktails against the backdrop of a breathtaking cityscape.

hotels.title: Century-Old Barcelona Modernist Suites on Passeig de Gracia with Rooftop Terrace & Spa
hotels.description: Located along the bustling Passeig de Gracia high street, this century-old art nouveau manor couldn't be better placed to discover the grandeur of Barcelona. Each of only six suites boasts heritage-listed frescoes, private terraces with city views, a personal assistant service and sumptuous living spaces dripping in modernist features. Savour authentic Catalan cuisine at the nearby Mercat de la Boqueria or explore the city's famed architectural landmarks, including Gaudi's Sagrada Familia and Park Guell. When evening falls, head to the rooftop terrace for a refreshing drink under the stars.

hotels.title: Sophisticated Central Barcelona Escape with Rooftop Pool Bar
hotels.description: Step off Barcelona’s most luxurious avenue, Passeig de Gracia, and into a world of sophistication with a stay at Granados 83. The hotel’s immaculately designed interiors feature a striking collection of original art from across Asia, with rooms surrounding an interior courtyard covered by magnificent glass roofing. Exuding style in all aspects from the modern restaurant to the sparkling pool and rooftop bar, you'll savour looking out over central Barcelona with your favourite cocktail in hand.

hotels.vendor_name: HOTEL INDIGO BARCELONA GRANVIA PLAZA ESPANA
hotels.title: Stylish Barcelona Escape in Eixample District with Bar & Outdoor Pool
hotels.description: Ideally located in the seaside city of Barcelona, in the heart of the Eixample District, the Hotel Indigo Barcelona - Plaza Catalunya, an IHG Hotel, will plunge you into sophisticated modernism, as inspiring architecture, culture, art, history and cuisine unfurl before you. Come for the flamboyant Modernista visual feast and welcoming service, and stay for the outdoor pool, seasonal cocktail bar and its enviable location in Spain’s renowned Catalonia region.

hotels.title: Five-Star Barcelona Escape on Passeig de Gràcia with Six World-Class Restaurants & Bars
hotels.description: Stay in the beating heart of Barcelona at the five-star Mandarin Oriental, Barcelona, located along Passeig de Gràcia, the most exclusive shopping boulevard in the city. Experience incredible dining and handcrafted cocktails in a trendy setting at six world-class restaurants and bars onsite (including a rooftop Mediterranean restaurant). Meanwhile, the onsite spa offers relaxing spa treatments, a 12-metre spa lap pool, an Oriental steam room and a fully equipped fitness centre for all your health and wellness needs.

hotels.title: Contemporary Barcelona Eixample Escape with Peaceful Pool & Two Bars
hotels.description: Live luxe in the heart of Barcelona's chic Eixample district at Hotel Balmes 4*. This architectural gem, a fusion of modern design and Catalan heritage, is a stone's throw from Gaudi's masterpieces and high-end boutiques. Indulge in cocktails on the terrace or surrounded by rare art at B Bar before dining at Balmes Restaurant. After a day of exploration, retreat to the hotel's tranquil private garden and pool, a rare urban oasis in this vibrant city.

hotels.title: Oceanfront Barcelona Oasis near Barceloneta Beach with Rooftop Pool
hotels.description: Explore the best of Barcelona from this five-star Sofitel base, ideally located just steps from Barceloneta Beach and a short stroll from the Gothic Quarter. Whether you're visiting for work or play, unwind in vibrant, contemporary rooms, take in sweeping city views from the rooftop pool or recharge in the fitness centre. Savour locally inspired cuisine at TENDIEZ Tapas Bar & Restaurant, alongside cocktails on a chic terrace. With direct access to Barcelona’s cultural heart, buzzing beach life and seamless transport connections, Sofitel Barcelona Skipper is your stylish escape for soaking up the city’s iconic energy.

hotels.title: Five-Star Barcelona Luxury at Spain's #1 Hotel with Daily Breakfast
hotels.description: Experience the vibrancy of Barcelona from the Best Hotel in Spain and Portugal, as voted by the 2020 Condé Nast Traveler Readers’ Choice Awards: the five-star Almanac Barcelona. Boasting an address to impress just steps from Spain's answer to the Champs-Elysées - the prominent Passeig de Gràcia - this sumptuous hotel takes you to the heart of the action in style and luxury. Wake up in one of the beautifully styled rooms and immerse yourself in the pulsing streets of Barcelona. Discover Gaudi’s masterpieces, Casa Batlló and Casa Milà, take a five-minute stroll to reach the bustling Las Ramblas boulevard and the historic streets of the old city, taste tapas with locals, then retreat to the hotel’s rooftop bar to toast your five-star city escape. Styled by local designer Jaime Beriestain, the hotel showcases contemporary décor with a wealth of textures and exquisite living spaces. Its long list of impeccable facilities includes a wellness centre, spa and the acclaimed, plant-focused restaurant VIRENS, serving exquisite dishes such as artichokes with candied flowers and Chinese cabbage dumplings (there's organic meat and fish too for the carnivores). The jewel in the hotel’s crown? The majestic, multitiered rooftop terrace, which offers spectacular views over Barcelona’s skyline, a sparkling pool and a laidback bar, Azimuth. Visit for yourself and discover why this stunning hotel is rated among Tripadvisor's top 1% worldwide, earning it a spot in the top luxury hotels in Spain at the Travellers' Choice 2020 Best of the Best awards. **Luxury Escapes inclusions (select nights)** - Indulgent **daily à la carte breakfast** served in the elegant surroundings of VIRENS restaurant - A **welcome cocktail, glass of wine or sparkling on arrival** to celebrate your city escape (for stays of 2+ nights) - **Complimentary upgrade to the next room category**, subject to availability (for stays of 4+ nights, excludes Almanac Suite) - **EUR25 food and drinks credit per room** to spend at the hotel’s restaurant and rooftop bar (for stays of 6+ nights) **Travelling with kids?** Check out the Family Upgrade for two adults and one child (aged 11 years and under). **Tripadvisor Travellers' Choice Best of the Best 2020** Top Luxury Hotels - Spain

hotels.title: Barcelona Five-Star Boutique Stay on Las Ramblas with Rooftop Pool, Bar & Restaurant
hotels.description: Right in the heart of Barcelona’s vibrant Las Ramblas district, Hotel Bagués promises five-star luxury and classic-meets-modern comforts. Formerly a jewellery workshop, it now shines as a boutique hotel, with a stunning rooftop pool offering panoramic city views its prized gem. Explore the iconic Gothic Quarter, the bustling Boqueria Market or the world-renowned Picasso Museum, and return to enjoy a drink in the intimate bar or a cocktail and snack poolside on the open-air terrace.

hotels.title: Award-Winning Barcelona Escape with Daily Breakfast & Welcome Drinks
hotels.description: Culture, awe-inspiring architecture, world-class art, history and delicious cuisine: it’s all on offer in the Spanish seaside city of Barcelona - and you are invited to stay right in the heart of the action at the boutique Hotel Sixtytwo. The hotel is rated among the top 1% of properties worldwide on Tripadvisor, and it’s easy to see why. Housed in a 19th-century building with a stunning modernist façade, this boutique gem offers a collection of modern rooms with luxe amenities, beautiful designer furniture and an elegant cocktail bar in one of the best locations in the city. You won’t have to venture far from your room to embrace Barcelona’s cool vibes and rich history. The hotel is ideally placed on one of the most prominent streets in the city, Passeig de Gràcia - known as the Spanish Champs-Elysées - making this the perfect launchpad for your explorations. Step outside the hotel's doors and find yourself a stone’s throw from Gaudi’s masterpieces Casa Batlló, Casa Milà and La Pedrera, bustling Plaza de Catalunya and some of Barcelona’s best boutique shops, cool bars and restaurants - city escapes don’t get much better than this. **Luxury Escapes inclusions (select nights/packages)** - Fuel city exploration with **deluxe daily continental breakfast** - Enjoy a **welcome drink on arrival** - **Upgrade to a Superior Room**, subject to availability (Interior Rooms only, for stays of 4+ nights) **Travelling with kids?** Check out the Family Room for two adults and two children (aged 11 years and under) **Tripadvisor Travellers' Choice, Best of the Best 2021** Top 25 Hotels - Spain

hotels.vendor_name: Grand Hotel Central - Small Luxury Hotels of the World
hotels.title: Contemporary Barcelona Retreat near Cathedral with Infinity Pool & Rooftop Terrace
hotels.description: Unlock the secrets of Barcelona's enchanting Old Town with an indulgent stay right in the centre of it all. Grand Hotel Central's design combines history and character with an inviting and cutting-edge decor by London design studio Sagrada, with a stylish rooftop bar, restaurant and pool area overlooking the bustling city. You can go from Mediterranean tapas to sun-kissed cocktails or take a dip in the sparkling rooftop infinity pool as you please. Offering delectable Spanish cuisine and rooftop DJ sets, take in the city's lively atmosphere while watching the sunset, or treat yourself at the onsite spa before discovering all of the city's delights.
